text: Rein Ratas (9 May 1938 – 18 April 2022) was an Estonian Centre Party politician. He was in the Riigikogu from 2007 until 2011 and again from 2015 until 2018. Ratas was the father of Prime Minister Jüri Ratas. He was born in Häädemeeste, Estonia. Ratas died on 18 April 2022 in Tallinn, Estonia at the age of 83.Suri endine riigikogu liige Rein Ratas ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Estonian politicians
title: Rein Ratas
